citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am on
October 17, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on doors and honking the vehicle horn.
After no one was found, the inspector called the licensee's phone and left message. There being no contact from the
licensee after 30 minutes, the inspector left the property.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am on 
October 17, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on doors and honking the vehicle horn. 
After no one was found, the inspector called the licensee's phone and left message. There being no contact from the 
licensee after 30 minutes, the inspector left the property.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
